full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

This tender announcement is for the procurement of SCUPPER VALVE ASSEMBLIES.

## Tender Details
- **Reference:** PW-23-01021886-2
- **Solicitation #:** W8482-231142/A
- **Publication date:** January 18, 2023
- **Closing date:** March 15, 2023 at 14:00:00 EST
- **Amendment #:** 2

## Description of Requirement
The Department of National Defence requires the procurement of the following items:
- **Item 1:** SCUPPER VALVE ASSEMBLY
	+ Quantity: 20
	+ Unit: Each
	+ Delivery location: CFB Esquimalt
- **Item 2:** SCUPPER VALVE ASSEMBLY
	+ Quantity: 20
	+ Unit: Each
	+ Delivery location: CFB Halifax

## Goods and Services
This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement and a preference for Canadian goods and services is applicable. Suppliers must provide prices in Canadian dollars only.

## Notice of Proposed Procurement
The procurement process is open to all qualified suppliers. The tender documents are available for download at [Canada's Buy and Sell portal](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). Bidders may submit proposals in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information
The contracting entity is the Department of National Defence. For queries, please contact:
- **Name:** Jean-Pierre Normandin
- **Email:** jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
- **Phone:** 819-939-3674
- **Location:** Directorate Maritime Procurement
- **Address:** 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

## Attachment
Please download the following attachments for more information:
- [RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/18/dd72bb2e029c79a9170f196304ec57f1/rfp_w8482-231142-a-en.pdf)
